product_name: Backpacker's Pantry Tomato Chipotle Pasta with Chicken - 2 Servings
long_description: The Backpacker's Pantry Tomato Basil Chipotle Pasta with Chicken meal features chicken in a creamy tomato, basil and chipotle sauce with pasta. Easy to prepare-just mix contents with boiling water in the pouch provided, let stand a few minutes, and serve. Makes two 13 oz. servings. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The Backpacker's Pantry Tomato Basil Chipotle Pasta with Chicken meal features chicken in a creamy tomato, basil and chipotle sauce with pasta.
